TopicTitle: Where has Bac9's Devblog article gone?

Articles.Content:
You know, the one where he gave a really fantastic run down of his approach to modelling and texturing, along with a coherent description of how he saw the game.

Seems like the devblogs all made it through the forum conversion, except his...

Edited November 30, 2015 by TMS
Luckily Bac9 posted it on Gamasutra as well.

^ Thanks for that.

Any word from Squad on this?

I realise there may be bigger forum issues to solve, post-upgrade... but two things occur to me:

  1. Assuming this is an error, it may be worth investigating as it could have an implications on the reliability of the impex routine you're using (does it mung imports randomly)
  2. Assuming it's not an error, and it's intentional, it's a pretty poor showing towards someone who added some of the highest quality content in the game and would probably deserve an "official" response.

Besides which, it's a part of KSP history and should be held up as such.

TIA
The article was actually posted as a blog, not an article. As such it was deleted in the transfer, though I'll try to figure out a way to bring it back in the list of articles

It's also preserved in the Internet Archive, if you want to see it in forum-blog format.

The Making Of New KSC
